pageProps.body:
Series

ω0=2πf0=2πT0\omega_0 = 2\pi f_0 = \frac{2\pi}{T_0}ω0​=2πf0​=T0​2π​

f(t)=av+∑n=1∞an cos⁡ nω0t+bn sin nω0tf(t) = a_v + \displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^\infin a_n \ \cos\ n\omega_0t + b_n \ sin \ n\omega_0 tf(t)=av​+n=1∑∞​an​ cos nω0​t+bn​ sin nω0​t

Fourier Coefficients

av=1T∫t0t0+Tf(t)dta_v = \frac{1}{T} \displaystyle\int_{t_0}^{t_0+T}f(t)dtav​=T1​∫t0​t0​+T​f(t)dt

ak=2T∫t0t0+Tf(t)cos⁡ kω0t dta_k = \frac{2}{T}\displaystyle\int_{t_0}^{t_0+T}f(t) \cos \ k\omega_0t \ dtak​=T2​∫t0​t0​+T​f(t)cos kω0​t dt

bk=2T∫t0t0+Tf(t)sin kω0t dtb_k = \frac{2}{T}\displaystyle\int_{t_0}^{t_0+T}f(t)sin \ k\omega_0t \ dtbk​=T2​∫t0​t0​+T​f(t)sin kω0​t dt

Even

Even = cosine
f(x)=f(−x)f(x) = f(-x)f(x)=f(−x)

av=2T∫0T2f(t)dta_v = \frac{2}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t)dtav​=T2​∫02T​​f(t)dt

ak=4T∫0T2f(t)cos⁡ kω0t dta_k = \frac{4}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t) \cos \ k\omega_0t \ dtak​=T4​∫02T​​f(t)cos kω0​t dt

bk=0b_k = 0bk​=0

Odd

Odd = Sine
f(x)=−f(−x)f(x) = -f(-x)f(x)=−f(−x)

av=2T∫0T2f(t)dta_v = \frac{2}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t)dtav​=T2​∫02T​​f(t)dt

ak=0a_k = 0ak​=0

bk=4T∫0T2f(t)sin kω0t dtb_k = \frac{4}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t)sin \ k\omega_0t \ dtbk​=T4​∫02T​​f(t)sin kω0​t dt

Half-Wave

Half-Wave = f(x)=−f(x±T2)f(x) = -f(x\pm\frac{T}{2})f(x)=−f(x±2T​)

av=0a_v = 0av​=0

ak={0 for k even 4T∫0T2f(t)cos⁡ kω0t dt for k odda_k = \begin{cases} 0 \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \quad \text{ for k even } \\ \frac{4}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t) \cos \ k\omega_0t \ dt \quad \text{ for k odd} \end{cases}ak​=⎩⎨⎧​0 for k even T4​∫02T​​f(t)cos kω0​t dt for k odd​

bk={0 for k even 4T∫0T2f(t)sin kω0t dt for k oddb_k = \begin{cases} 0 \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \quad \text{ for k even } \\ \frac{4}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{2}}f(t)sin \ k\omega_0t \ dt \quad \text{ for k odd} \end{cases}bk​=⎩⎨⎧​0 for k even T4​∫02T​​f(t)sin kω0​t dt for k odd​

Quarter-Wave Even

Quarter-wave = (Even || Odd) && Half-Wave (parent rule inherited)
av=0 (half-wave)a_v = 0 \text{ (half-wave)}av​=0 (half-wave)

ak={0 for k even (half-wave)8T∫0T4f(t) cos⁡ kω0t dt for k odda_k = \begin{cases} 0 \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \quad \text{ for k even (half-wave)} \\ \frac{8}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{4}} f(t) \ \cos \ k\omega_0t \ dt \quad \text{ for k odd} \end{cases}ak​=⎩⎨⎧​0 for k even (half-wave)T8​∫04T​​f(t) cos kω0​t dt for k odd​

bk=0 (even)b_k = 0 \text{ (even)}bk​=0 (even)

Quarter-Wave Odd

Quarter-wave = (Even || Odd) && Half-Wave (parent rule inherited)
av=0 (half-wave)a_v = 0 \text{ (half-wave)}av​=0 (half-wave)
ak=0 (odd)a_k = 0 \text{ (odd)}ak​=0 (odd)

bk={0 for k even (half-wave)8T∫0T4f(t) sin kω0t dt for k oddb_k = \begin{cases} 0 \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \quad \text{ for k even (half-wave)} \\ \frac{8}{T} \displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{T}{4}} f(t) \ sin \ k\omega_0t \ dt \quad \text{ for k odd} \end{cases}bk​=⎩⎨⎧​0 for k even (half-wave)T8​∫04T​​f(t) sin kω0​t dt for k odd​

Alternative Trigonometric Form

f(t)=av+∑n=1∞An cos⁡(nω0t−θn)f(t) = a_v + \displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^\infin A_n \ \cos(n\omega_0t-\theta_n)f(t)=av​+n=1∑∞​An​ cos(nω0​t−θn​)

an−jbn=an2+bn2 ∠−θn=An∠−θna_n - jb_n = \sqrt{a_n^2+b_n^2} \ \angle{-\theta_n}= A_n \angle{-\theta_n}an​−jbn​=an2​+bn2​​ ∠−θn​=An​∠−θn​

θn=−tan−1(bnan)\theta_n = -tan^{-1}(\frac{b_n}{a_n})θn​=−tan−1(an​bn​​)

An,θn={an,0for even f(t)bn,90for odd f(t)A_n, \theta_n = \begin{cases} a_n, 0 \qquad \text{for even } f(t) \\ b_n, 90 \qquad \text{for odd } f(t) \\ \end{cases}An​,θn​={an​,0for even f(t)bn​,90for odd f(t)​

Exponential Form

f(t)=∑n=−∞∞Cnejnω0tf(t) = \displaystyle\sum_{n=-\infin}^\infin C_n e^{jn\omega_0t}f(t)=n=−∞∑∞​Cn​ejnω0​t

Cn=1T∫t0t0+Tf(t)e−jnω0tdtC_n = \frac{1}{T} \displaystyle\int_{t_0}^{t_0 + T} f(t) e^{-jn\omega_0 t}dtCn​=T1​∫t0​t0​+T​f(t)e−jnω0​tdt

Cn=12(an−jbn)=An2∠−θn, n=1,2,3,...C_n = \frac{1}{2} (a_n - jb_n) = \frac{A_n}{2}\angle{-\theta_n}, \ n = 1, 2, 3, ...Cn​=21​(an​−jbn​)=2An​​∠−θn​, n=1,2,3,...

C0=1T∫t0t0+Tf(t)dtC_0 = \frac{1}{T} \displaystyle\int_{t_0}^{t_0+T}f(t)dtC0​=T1​∫t0​t0​+T​f(t)dt
